findings.description: POST handler performs database writes without authentication checks
findings.fix: Add authentication check to verify user identity before processing requests.

findings.description: DELETE handler performs database writes without authentication checks
findings.fix: Add authentication check to verify user identity before processing requests.

findings.description: GET handler reads user table without role-based authorization
findings.fix: Implement role-based access control and verify user roles before allowing access to sensitive data or operations.

findings.description: GET handler reads user table without role-based authorization
findings.fix: Implement role-based access control and verify user roles before allowing access to sensitive data or operations.
